content: I can reproduce this issue consistently. It happens every time I try to submit the form without filling in all required fields.
Thanks for the report. I'll look into the validation logic and see what's causing this.
I've pushed a potential fix to the validation-fix branch. Can you test it and let me know if the issue persists?
The new dashboard layout looks great! Just a few minor adjustments needed for mobile responsiveness.
This performance issue is critical. Load times are exceeding 5 seconds on the main page.
I've identified the bottleneck. The issue is with the database queries. Working on optimization now.
